ygData.subject: HE Druid?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, been a while since Ive posted anything. Thought Id run this by you guys. Gonna start a second charactor & thinking of a HE Druid? I have a lvl 14
ygData.messageBody:
Hello all, been a while since Ive posted
anything. Thought Id run this by you guys. Gonna start a
second charactor & thinking of a HE Druid? I have a lvl
14 Enc & love the spells & the starting point~ so,
thought Id get the best of both out of this race/class!
New charactor & new spells all in the area I know
well.<br> LOL, well it kinda sounds like Ive already
answered my own question~ But none the less I still look
to you guys for a lil EQ knowlege on the
issue<br>thanx
